spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Mage)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Potent Cantrip
entries: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
